commands.name: az devops security permission list
commands.summary: List tokens for given user/group and namespace.
commands.syntax:
az devops security permission list --id
                                   --subject
                                   [--detect {false, true}]
                                   [--org]
                                   [--recurse]
                                   [--token]

commands.name: az devops security permission reset
commands.summary: Reset permission for given permission bit(s).
commands.syntax:
az devops security permission reset --id
                                    --permission-bit
                                    --subject
                                    --token
                                    [--detect {false, true}]
                                    [--org]

commands.name: az devops security permission reset-all
commands.summary: Clear all permissions of this token for a user/group.
commands.syntax:
az devops security permission reset-all --id
                                        --subject
                                        --token
                                        [--detect {false, true}]
                                        [--org]
                                        [--yes]

commands.name: az devops security permission show
commands.summary: Show permissions for given token, namespace and user/group.
commands.syntax:
az devops security permission show --id
                                   --subject
                                   --token
                                   [--detect {false, true}]
                                   [--org]

commands.name: az devops security permission update
commands.summary: Assign allow or deny permission to given user/group.
commands.syntax:
az devops security permission update --id
                                     --subject
                                     --token
                                     [--allow-bit]
                                     [--deny-bit]
                                     [--detect {false, true}]
                                     [--merge {false, true}]
                                     [--org]
examples:
az devops security permission update  --allow-bit 7 --namespace-id            52d39943-cb85-4d7f-8fa8-c6baac873819 --subject user@fabrikam.com            --token "`$PROJECT:vstfs:///Classification/TeamProject/e479xxxx-2be8-xxxx-bb0b-3a0209cxxxx"

You would need to add the bit value of the various permission bits to
simultaneously allow/deny multiple permissions.
